ComicInfo.Title: Once, Again, Always
ComicInfo.Summary: Once, Again, Always: The Turtles and their friends hold a memorial service for Slash in the desert. Mikey and Leo arrive from the future to pick up future Raph and Don. They bring Nobuko with them so she can meet her great-grandmother, April O'Neil. A Native American medicine man tells the Turtles a creation myth where the world is a giant island sitting on the shell of a turtle.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 19:44:48. [Issue ID 131694]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
